utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: A Restaurant, Phoebe, Rachel, and Monica are having brunch.]

utterances.transcript: Okay, the reason why I asked you guys out to brunch today is because I have been doing some thinking about who should be my maid of honor.
caption: the reason i asked you to brunch is because i ve been thinking about my maid of honor

utterances.transcript: Oh my God! This is it! I really hope it's you!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh my God! This is it! (She and Phoebe hold hands.) (To Phoebe) I really hope it's you!
caption: oh my god this is it oh i hope it s you

utterances.transcript: I hope it's you.
caption: i hope it s you

utterances.transcript: Me too!
caption: me too

utterances.transcript: First of all um, I love you both so much and you're both so important to me...

utterances.transcript: Okay, bla-bla-bla-bla!! Who is it?!
caption: blah blah blah who is it

utterances.transcript: Well umm, I was thinking that maybe we could come up with a system where we trade of being maid of honor for each other. Like hypothetically, if Phoebe were mine...

utterances.transcript: Yes!!! Oh!!
caption: yes oh

utterances.transcript: Hypothetically!
caption: hypothetically

utterances.transcript: Still.

utterances.transcript: If Phoebe were my maid of honor...
caption: if phoebe were mine rachel would be phoebe s i d be rachel s

utterances.transcript: Uh-hmm.
Rachel would be Phoebe's, I would be Rachel's, that way we all get to do it once and no one would get upset.
caption: we all get to do it and no one gets upset

utterances.transcript: Yeah that's actually a pretty good idea.
caption: that s a pretty good idea

utterances.transcript: Yeah, I'll do that. So who gets to be yours?
caption: i ll do that so who s yours

utterances.transcript: Well that's the best part. Umm, you guys get to decide!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (laughs) Well that's the best part. Umm, you guys get to decide!

utterances.transcript: Wh-why is that the best part?
caption: why is that the best part

utterances.transcript: Because then I don't have to!
caption: i don t have to

utterances.transcript: Well of course we will help you decide! We will do anything we can to help you! Now, I would like to make a toast, to the future Mrs. Chandler Bing , my best friend, and truly one of the nicest people that...
utterances.transcript_with_note: Well of course we will help you decide! We will do anything we can to help you! utterances.transcript: Fine!

utterances.transcript: Yeah that's right.

utterances.transcript: Huh, good luck!

caption: huh good luck

utterances.transcript: Aww, and good luck to you too! What a nice lady!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Aww, and good luck to you too! (To Monica and Rachel) What a nice lady!

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Ross's apartment, Die Hard has ended, only I don't think Joey and Ross know that yet. As you see, they are both asleep. And they're on the same couch. Which means they're sleeping together. Not like Joey is at one end and Ross is on the other, they both happen to be lying down and sleeping together. Well, there hasn't been any clothes removed so not that kind of sleeping together. Not that there's anything wrong with that. That is unless you're a Republican in which that kind of thing will bring about the downfall of Western society, especially if they should happen to want to get married. Anyway, let me recap. No, there is too much, let me sum up. Ross and Joey are taking a nap together on top of each other and both wake-up at the same time, realize what they just did, scream, and jump up.]

utterances.transcript: No touch! No touch!

plots: Joey and Ross watch a movie and fall asleep together on the couch .
Having enjoyed the experience , Joey tries to get Ross to nap together again but Ross refuses because it 's too weird .
After watching Die Hard , Ross and Joey fall asleep on the couch and have a very good nap .

utterances.transcript: It's a nickname, I'll explain later.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (To Monica) It's a nickname, I'll explain later.
caption: it s a nickname i ll explain later

utterances.transcript: It's pretty clear.
caption: it s pretty clear

utterances.transcript: Ah, uh, I owe you a long overdue apology. I never should have broken up with you because you were overweight.
caption: i owe you a long overdue apology i shouldn t have broken up with you because you were overweight

utterances.transcript: That's why you broke up with me?
caption: that s why you broke up with me

utterances.transcript: You-you-you didn't know that. Well, I guess my work here is done!
utterances.transcript_with_note: You-you-you didn't know that. (Pause as she nods no.) Well, I guess my work here is done!
caption: you didn t know that well i guess my work here is done

plots: Julie did n't know Julie was broken up with because Julie was overweight .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Central Perk, Joey and Ross are giving Phoebe and Rachel the results of their election. Somewhat faster than Florida I might add.]

utterances.transcript: All right, well first of all I would like to say that you both performed very well. Okay? You should be proud of yourselves. And-and I would also like to say that in this competition there are no losers. Well, except for Rachel-Damnit!
caption: first of all i would like to say you both performed very well okay you should be proud and i d also like to say in this competition there are no losers well except rachel damn it

utterances.transcript: Really?! I won!
caption: really i won

utterances.transcript: What?!
caption: what

utterances.transcript: I'm sorry Rach, it was, it was really close.
caption: i m sorry rach it was really close

utterances.transcript: Well then I demand a recount!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Well then I demand a recount! (Hmm, I wonder where I've heard that before.)
caption: well then i demand a recount

utterances.transcript: Actually, it wasn't that close.
caption: actually it wasn t that close

utterances.transcript: No! Y'know what? No! No! You thing was so stupid anyway, this was ridiculous-We're gonna flip a coin! All right?! Heads!
utterances.transcript_with_note: No! Y'know what? No! No! You thing was so stupid anyway, this was ridiculous-We're gonna flip a coin! (Phoebe gasps.) All right?! (She flips the coin.) Heads! (Looks at the coin and grunts in disgust.)
caption: you know what your thing was so stupid anyway we re gonna flip a coin all right heads oh

utterances.transcript: The coins have finally forgiven me!
caption: what the coins have finally forgiven me

utterances.transcript: Well y'know what? I hope Monica forgives you after you throw her, her vegetarian, voodoo, goddess circley shower!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Well y'know what? I hope Monica forgives you after you throw her, her vegetarian, voodoo, goddess circley shower! (Runs out.)
caption: you know what i hope monica forgives you after you throw her her vegetarian voodoo goddess circle y shower

utterances.transcript: Rach, it's gonna be okay! You guys are the best!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (running after her) Rach, it's gonna be okay! (To Ross and Joey) You guys are the best!
caption: rach it s gonna be okay you guys are the best

utterances.transcript: Boy I tell ya, that judging stuff took a lot out of me.
caption: boy i tell you that judging stuff took a lot out of me

utterances.transcript: Yeah?
caption: yeah

utterances.transcript: Yeah! I was thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah! I was thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch. (Raises his eyebrows, questioning Ross to see if he wants to join him.)
caption: yeah thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch

utterances.transcript: Why-why would I care about that?
caption: why would i care about that

utterances.transcript: No reason, I'm just saying that uh... That's where I'll be.
caption: no reason i m just saying that that s where i ll be

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Joey gets up and heads for the door. After a pause Ross decides to join him.)

plots: After several attempts at deciding , and having Ross and Joey make the choice , they eventually just flip a coin and it comes up in favor of Phoebe .
Joey let s slip that Rachel lost the election which implies Phoebe won .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Chandler and Monica have returned from Julie's.]

utterances.transcript: As bad as that went I actually enjoyed myself. I think that I'm going to apologize for all of the stupid things I do.
caption: as bad as that went i actually enjoyed myself i think that i m going to apologize for all the stupid things that i do

utterances.transcript: Why don't you just stop doing stupid things? Then you wouldn't have to apologize.
caption: why don t you just stop doing stupid things then you wouldn t have to apologize

utterances.transcript: I would really love it if could do both.
caption: i d love it if i could do both

utterances.transcript: All right, I...I have to ask.
caption: all right i have to ask

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Are you gonna break up with me if I get fat again?
caption: will you break up with me if i get fat again

utterances.transcript: What?!
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Well, you broke up with Julie Grath! How much weight could she have gained?
caption: you broke up with julie how much weight did she gain

utterances.transcript: A hundred and forty-five pounds.
caption: a hundred and forty five pounds

utterances.transcript: In one year?! My God what did she eat? Her-her family! That's not the point.
caption: in one year my god what did she eat her family that s not the point

utterances.transcript: Look I know it was a stupid reason to break up with somebody, but I was 15!
caption: i know it was a stupid reason to break up with someone but i was 15

utterances.transcript: Well... That's not the only time this was an issue. You remember when umm, you spent Thanksgiving with us? You called me fat.
caption: yeah well that s not the only time this was an issue you remember when you spent thanksgiving with us you called me fat

utterances.transcript: Okay. Okay, now wait a minute that was totally different.
caption: wait a minute that was totally different

utterances.transcript: How?
caption: how

utterances.transcript: You were not supposed to hear that! I said that behind you back!
caption: you were not supposed to hear that i said that behind your back

utterances.transcript: What if I have babies, okay? I mean I'm gonna look different. I'm okay with that, but I'm not sure that you are!
caption: what if i have babies okay i m gonna look different i m okay with that but i m not sure you are

utterances.transcript: Look you have to realize I don't think of you as a thin, beautiful woman. See this is one of things that I can apologize for later! Look, what I mean is you're Monica! Okay? And I am in love with Monica.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Look you have to realize I don't think of you as a thin, beautiful woman. (Monica glares at him.) See this is one of things that I can apologize for later! Look, what I mean is you're Monica! Okay? And I am in love with Monica.
caption: you have to realize i don t think of you as a thin beautiful woman this is one of the things that i can apologize for later what i mean is you re monica okay and i am in love with monica

utterances.transcript: Keep going.
caption: keep going

utterances.transcript: So you can balloon up or you can shrink down and I will still love you.
caption: so you can balloon up or you can shrink down and i will still love you

utterances.transcript: Even if I shrink down to two inches tall?
caption: even if i shrink down to 2 inches tall

utterances.transcript: I'd carry you around in my pocket.
caption: i d carry you around in my pocket

utterances.transcript: I love you.
utterances.transcript_with_note: I love you. (They hug and kiss.)
caption: i love you

utterances.transcript: Skidmark's still got a way with the ladies.
caption: skidmark still got a way with the ladies

plots: She turns out to be Julie Graff , whom Chandler dumped when he was 15 because she got fat .
Monica and Chandler come back from Chandler apologizing to Julie , while Monica worries Chandler will leave her if she gets fat .
She forces Chandler to go to the girl to apologize , but when he does the two find she had n't actually been aware of the reason for the break - up , embarrassing him .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Central Perk, Phoebe is there as Rachel enters carrying a shopping bag.]

utterances.transcript: Hi Pheebs.
caption: hi pheebs

utterances.transcript: Hi!
caption: hi

utterances.transcript: Hi! I just want to apologize. I'm really sorry I was a baby.
caption: hi i just want to apologize i m really sorry i was a baby

utterances.transcript: That's ridiculous Rachel, we were all babies once. Oh, you mean today.
utterances.transcript_with_note: That's ridiculous Rachel, we were all babies once. (Rachel looks at her.) Oh, you mean today.
caption: that s ridiculous rachel we were all babies once oh you mean today

utterances.transcript: Yeah. Yeah, and y'know you-you deserve to win. And-and y'know I was thinking about it, if-if you're Monica's maid of honor that means I get to be yours.
caption: yeah yeah and you know you deserve to win and i was thinking about it if you re monica s maid of honor i get to be yours

utterances.transcript: Oh yeah!
caption: oh yeah

utterances.transcript: Yeah! Oh, umm when-when Monica and Chandler got engaged I started putting some stuff together, y'know just in case...
caption: yeah when monica and chandler got engaged i put some stuff together just in case

utterances.transcript: Oh that's so sweet thanks.
caption: oh that s so sweet thanks

utterances.transcript: Here is a book of poetry that I know Monica loves. And-and ohh God this is funny, look, this is a picture of one Halloween where she dressed up as a bride. And look, she made me carry her train, which was weird because I was Wonder Woman. Oh and here's a little purse that I found. Y'know I just thought that maybe they could hold the rings in there.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Here is a book of poetry that I know Monica loves. And-and ohh God this is funny, look, this is a picture of one Halloween where she dressed up as a bride. (Shows Phoebe the picture.) And look, she made me carry her train, which was weird because I was Wonder Woman. Oh and here's a little purse that I found. (Hands her the purse) Y'know I just thought that maybe they could hold the rings in there.
caption: here is a book of poetry that i know monica loves oh god this is funny look here s a picture from one halloween when she dressed up as a bride she made me carry her train which was weird because i was wonder woman oh and here s a little purse that i found i just thought they could hold the rings in there

utterances.transcript: Ohh.
caption: oh

utterances.transcript: And umm, vintage handkerchiefs y'know 'cause, people cry at weddings. I'm just gonna grab a couple of these.
utterances.transcript_with_note: And umm, vintage handkerchiefs y'know 'cause, people cry at weddings. (Starting to cry.) I'm just gonna grab a couple of these.
caption: vintage handkerchiefs you know because people cry at weddings i m just gonna grab a couple of these

utterances.transcript: This stuff is great!
caption: this stuff is great

utterances.transcript: Oh, I forgot this was in here. Umm, this was the uh garter that I was saving for my wedding and I wanted it to be Monica's something borrowed and it's blue. Yeah...
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh, I forgot this was in here. Umm, this was the uh garter that I was saving for my wedding and I wanted it to be Monica's something borrowed and it's blue. (Starts to cry again.) Yeah...
caption: i forgot this was in here this was the garter that i was saving for my wedding and i wanted it to be monica s something borrowed and it s blue yeah

utterances.transcript: Y'know Rach, I think that, I think you should be Monica's made of honor.
caption: rach i think that you should be monica s maid of honor

utterances.transcript: You do? Why?
caption: you do why

utterances.transcript: Because I think it means more to you.
caption: because i think it means more to you

utterances.transcript: But Pheebs, y'know you earned it.
caption: but pheebs honey you earned it

utterances.transcript: Its fine. I mean, this is something that you've been thinking about since you were what, 14?
utterances.transcript_with_note: Its fine. I mean, this is something that you've been thinking about since you were what, 14? (She's referring to the Halloween picture.)
caption: it s fine i mean this is something that you ve been thinking about since you were what 14

utterances.transcript: No, I was ten. I just developed early.
caption: no i was 10 i just developed early

utterances.transcript: Man alive!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (looking at the picture again) Man alive!
caption: man alive

utterances.transcript: Hey, what's going on?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (entering) Hey, what's going on?
caption: hey what s going on

utterances.transcript: Hey!
caption: hey

utterances.transcript: Well, we just decided that Rachel is gonna be your maid of honor.
caption: we decided rachel is going to be your maid of honor

utterances.transcript: Ohh, wow! That's great! Oh wow! We really have to start planning! I have, I have a lot of really specific ideas! We should probably get together like four times per week. You can come over to my place; we'll get together before work! What do you say, 6:30, my place? I'm so excited!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (gasps) Ohh, wow! That's great! (Rachel and Monica hug.) Oh wow! We really have to start planning! I have, I have a lot of really specific ideas! We should probably get together like four times per week. You can come over to my place; we'll get together before work! What do you say, 6:30, my place? I'm so excited! (Runs out leaving Rachel completely stunned and Phoebe laughing.)
caption: oh that s great oh wow okay we really have to start planning i have really specific ideas we should meet four times a week come to my place we ll get together before work what do you say 6 30 my place so excited

utterances.transcript: Yeah okay, you laugh now, but she's gonna be yours.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah okay, you laugh now, but she's gonna be yours. (Phoebe gets suddenly scared.)
caption: yeah okay you laugh now she s gonna be yours

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Joey and Rachel's, Joey and Ross are napping together again and both wake up at the same time.]

utterances.transcript: Great nap.
caption: great nap

utterances.transcript: It really was.
caption: it really was

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Suddenly Rachel clears her throat and the camera cuts to the rest of the gang staring at them. Needless to say Joey and Ross are shocked and slowly turn their heads to see the gang.)

utterances.transcript: Dude! What the hell are you doing?! God!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (reacting first by jumping up) Dude! What the hell are you doing?! God! (Heads for his room leaving Ross.)
caption: dude what the hell are you doing god

utterances.transcript: Excuse me.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (slowly stands up and says quietly) Excuse me. (Exits.)
caption: excuse me

utterances.transcript_with_note: End

plots: Joey and Ross unknowingly take a nap together and Joey leaves in embarassment .
